about.content: NIVS Group is a company specialized in import and distribution, serving markets and local stores with a wide range of products. With years of experience in the industry, we are committed to quality and reliable partnerships.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: How can I place an order?
faq.a1: Contact our sales department by email or phone. We will guide you through the process.
faq.a2: We deliver nationwide. Terms depend on order size and location. Contact logistics for details.
faq.q3: Do you work with new retailers?
faq.a3: Yes. We welcome new partners. Get in touch with our sales or marketing team to discuss options.
